commit message: Intentional error, so Github will update the image

Revert 'Intentional error, so Github will update the image'

This reverts commit 812b7e35223b726e2a8da090bd38a388c192eed2.
Updated Gradle Android plugin and buildToolsVersion
Check MD5 of .hex file before uploading
No need to call getApplicationContext in main activity

Retrieve the BluetoothAdapter in a new way in JELLY_BEAN_MR2 and above

Also check if mChatService and mBluetoothHandler is null before creating them
There is no reason to check flavour before calling close()
Added link to original blog post

Check if data is available before trying to read data

Also set stopReading to false when calling cancel() to make sure thread is stopped
Check if internet connection is available in a better way

Updated GraphView library

Needed for fix a bug in scrollToEnd first - see: https://github.com/Lauszus/GraphView/commit/5c82b32fd202590f886d5b67c14f227d7a2c5a7a
According to specs I should call setMeasuredDimension as well
Wait a bit before closing Bluetooth connection, as onPause needs to send some data first
SCREEN_ORIENTATION_USER_PORTRAIT is not available until api level 18
Update Android Gradle plugin, build tools, and do not abort on lint error
Set versionCode, versionName and archiveBaseName in a more elegant way
Fixed all lint errors and warnings
Can now make the robot start pairing with a PS4 controller
Only trim the incoming string once
